ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: speaking of which, what/where/how hard drops the Iksar illusion mask? and is it like the old guise of deceiver(anyone can use) or the new guise of deception
ygData.messageBody:
speaking of which, what/where/how hard drops the Iksar illusion mask? and is
it like the old guise of deceiver(anyone can use) or the new guise of
deception (has to be equipped)?

and reguarding cool lookin mobs, the golems in Chardok scared the shit out
of me last night when i saw one running my way like a locomotive. amen for
enchanters

-Rakka
Sol Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [SMTP:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 12:07 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
>
> I haven't seen one of those yet but I have to say that both the spiders
> and
> the leeches really really really really gross me out.
>
> Hally
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 10:02 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
>
> Burynai are really cool! One of my favorite mobs from
> Kunark so far. They
> look like bipedal badgers, complete with the enormous claws!
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 9:54 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
>
>
>
> --- Kyle Sibbald <ksibbald@...> wrote:
> > This is all what I figured about the quest when i
> > first heard about it. So
> > far as I gathered, there is no recipe. We apparently
> > have to find one or
> > rather forage one where burynai live.
>
> OK, what is a burynai?
>
